about.text: I'm a developer from Tandil, Buenos Aires, Argentina. Passionate for programming and creating new and innovative software. Well-versed in promoting objective-oriented approaches to real-time software development. Analytical, empathic and detail-oriented. With interest in learning new technologies and meeting new people.

experience.title: Freelance Work
experience.description: Development of projects (Java and Full stack webs) to improve the performance of my abilities.

education.description: Course about JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, MySQL, Angular, Spring Boot, Bootstrap. And other concepts like DevOps, Testing, Web Security, Effective Communication, OOP, Figma, SCRUM.
